description:
NOTE: TO PLAY THIS GAME YOU MUST USE A VR HEADSET AND ADD IT AS A GAME ON STEAM

--------------------------------------------------------

The Galactic Archive: Powers Of Motion

You are sent to an alien planet to gain artefacts for a museum, but inside lurks an ability beyond comprehension.

TGA is an active, adventure, narrative VR game demo created as part of the Serious Games module at Bath Spa University. It will push your body to its limits while immersing you in a story surrounding the ethical use of important pieces of other cultural history.

--------------------------------------------------------

This game is a WIP! I will be trying to update the visuals especially in future to create a more polished experience!
